about.description: This library provides an httplib2 transport for google-auth. Note that httplib has lots of problems such as lack of threadsafety and insecure usage of TLS. Using it is highly discouraged. This library is intended to help existing users of oauth2client migrate to google-auth.

This library provides an httplib2 transport for google-auth. Note that httplib has lots of problems such as lack of threadsafety and insecure usage of TLS. Using it is highly discouraged. This library is intended to help existing users of oauth2client migrate to google-auth.

name: google-auth-httplib2
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "google-auth-httplib2" %}
{% set version = "0.2.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/google-auth-httplib2-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 38aa7badf48f974f1eb9861794e9c0cb2a0511a4ec0679b1f886d108f5640e05

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.6
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.6
    - google-auth
    - httplib2 >=0.19.0

test:
  imports:
    - google_auth_httplib2
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip

about:
  home: https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/google-auth-library-python-httplib2
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: Apache
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Google Authentication Library httplib2 transport
  description: This library provides an httplib2 transport for google-auth. Note that httplib has lots of problems such as lack of threadsafety and insecure usage of TLS. Using it is highly discouraged. This library is intended to help existing users of oauth2client migrate to google-auth.
  doc_url: https://google-auth.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
  dev_url: https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/google-auth-library-python-httplib2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - xylar
    - jreback
    - parthea
    - theacodes
    - tswast
